SELECT t1.*, t2.* FROM ( SELECT
round(sum( radiation_dose )/60000,2) AS radiationDose, round(max( peak_irradiance ),2) AS peakIrradiance,
round( avg( avg_temp ),2) AS avgTemp, round(max( max_temp ),2) AS maxTemp, round( min( min_temp ),2) AS minTemp,
round(avg( avg_wind_speed ),2) AS avgWindSpeed, round(max( max_wind_speed ),2) AS maxWindSpeed, round(min( min_wind_speed ),2) AS minWindSpeed,
DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y-%m" ) data_time FROM jb_numerical_statistics jb LEFT JOIN cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes cc ON cc.station_id = jb.station_id WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y" )= #{year}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y-%m" ) ) t1 left JOIN ( SELECT
round(sum( radiation_dose )/60000,2) AS radiationDoseTq, round(sum( peak_irradiance ),2) AS peakIrradianceTq,
round( avg( avg_temp ),2) AS avgTempTq, round(max( max_temp ),2) AS maxTempTq, round( min( min_temp ),2) AS minTempTq,
round(avg( avg_wind_speed ),2) AS avgWindSpeedTq, round(max( max_wind_speed ),2) AS maxWindSpeedTq, round(min( min_wind_speed ),2) AS minWindSpeedTq,
DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y-%m" ) data_time_tq FROM jb_numerical_statistics jb LEFT JOIN cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes cc ON cc.station_id = jb.station_id WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y" )= #{year}-1
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y-%m" ) ) t2 ON SUBSTR( t1.data_time, 6, 7 )= SUBSTR( t2.data_time_tq, 6, 7 ) ORDER BY t1.data_time

SELECT
round(sum( radiation_dose )/60000,2) AS radiationDose, round(sum( peak_irradiance ),2) AS peakIrradiance,
round( sum( avg_temp ),2) AS avgTemp, round(sum( max_temp ),2) AS maxTemp, round( sum( min_temp ),2) AS minTemp,
round(sum( avg_wind_speed ),2) AS avgWindSpeed, round(sum( max_wind_speed ),2) AS maxWindSpeed, round(sum( min_wind_speed ),2) AS minWindSpeed,
DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%m" ) data_time,cc.aname FROM jb_numerical_statistics jb LEFT JOIN cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes cc ON cc.station_id = jb.station_id WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y" )= #{year}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%m" ),cc.aname UNION SELECT
round(sum( radiation_dose )/60000,2) AS radiationDose, round(sum( peak_irradiance ),2) AS peakIrradiance,
round( sum( avg_temp ),2) AS avgTemp, round(sum( max_temp ),2) AS maxTemp, round( sum( min_temp ),2) AS minTemp,
round(sum( avg_wind_speed ),2) AS avgWindSpeed, round(sum( max_wind_speed ),2) AS maxWindSpeed, round(sum( min_wind_speed ),2) AS minWindSpeed,
DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%m" ) data_time, '冀北' as aname FROM jb_numerical_statistics jb WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y" )= #{year}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%m" )

SELECT sum(case when jb.sunlight_duration >= 3 and jb.sunlight_duration < 6 then 1 else 0 end) over3, sum(case when jb.sunlight_duration >= 6 then 1 else 0 end) over6, cc.aname, NULL as over3Tq, NULL as over6Tq from jb_numerical_statistics jb LEFT JOIN cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes cc ON cc.station_id = jb.station_id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y" )= #{year}
GROUP BY aname UNION SELECT NULL as over3, NULL as over6, cc.aname , sum(case when jb.sunlight_duration >= 3 and jb.sunlight_duration < 6 then 1 else 0 end) over3Tq, sum(case when jb.sunlight_duration >= 6 then 1 else 0 end) over6Tq FROM jb_numerical_statistics jb LEFT JOIN cloudiip_access_equipment.v_stations_codes cc ON cc.station_id = jb.station_id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT( `data_time`, "%Y" )= #{year}-1
GROUP BY aname
